EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-11-15 Cloud Rush.ES-2018-11-15 Cloud Rush
EmailTemplate.subject: Conquer your Cloud Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Whether you're an active participant or just an observer, there's a Cloud Rush going on. Workloads are growing over 20x faster in the public cloud than on-premises.
Inspired by the gold rush (and silent movies) we've created a series of short films that have some fun looking at this Cloud Rush. Here's Episode 1:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-rush/]]>
If you're attending AWS re:Invent, visit us at Booth 413 to learn how you can conquer the Cloud Rush.
If you prefer, click here to schedule a meeting <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/reinvent2018/external_request/0ce7a1]]> with Turbonomic executives to learn first-hand from the experts how you can assure performance, maintain compliance and minimize cost in the Cloud Rush.
We hope to see you there!
Best, Team Turbonomic
